main event: Two conic objects were observed by a control tower operator at Laredo AFB, Texas, on November 3, 1952, traveling at high speed at an estimated altitude of 6,000 feet.
interesting points: The sighting involved two conic objects that were bright silver-gray in color,The operator had trouble estimating the distance but thought they were approximately 10.6 to 22 miles away,The objects were moving faster than anything the operator had seen before,The sky conditions included scattered clouds with visibility about twelve miles,The sighting lasted about 3-4 seconds before the objects disappeared to the south at a high speed.
witness description: control tower operators at Laredo AFB
